about_the_game:
Story
One day, Rim, the daughter of a demon king, is told by her mother to go and defeat a brave warrior and goes on a trip to the human world.
She reluctantly decides to go and defeat the hero.
It's her first time in the human world, and she's more than a little excited.
Will the free-spirited Rim be able to defeat the hero safely?

Characters

Rim
Daughter of a demon king. One day, her mother tells her to go and defeat a brave man, and she sets off on a journey.
But she doesn't like to be told what to do and is a free-spirited character.

Noel
A brave warrior. He is currently the king of the country.
He seems to have had some trouble with the Demon King, Rim's parent, in the past.

Basic Operation
Move Arrow keys or left click or WASD
Dash Hold down the shift key while moving.
Menu X key or right click
Skip Left-click and hold


Battle
The monsters in the field
If you don't approach them, they won't fight.
Some monsters, such as bosses, are forced to fight.
The game is over when your HP becomes zero.

Items
You can buy items at stores in each location.

You can buy items at shops in each location.
The battle is a turn-based battle.
The game will be cleared when you defeat the hero.
The game is an RPG game.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains the following sexual content
・Sexual language

name: Queen of Succubus

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: ：Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: One day, Rim, the daughter of a demon king, is told by her mother to go and defeat a brave warrior and goes on a trip to the human world. She reluctantly decides to go and defeat the hero.
supported_languages:
Japanese*, English, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
